research.BLADEWOOD.title: First at all
research.BLADEWOOD.text.stage.1:
I need a katana.
Do you know the beauty of katana?That's why I want to.
I think I need a wooden sword.
research.BLADEWOOD.text.stage.2:
Only two logs,a sheath can be made.
Use sword and sheath,it will be a katana.
This is a try.
research.BLADEWOOD.text.stage.3:
Yeah!A wooden katana made by myself.
It's nice for me,I will take care of this one.
There are some new recipes,and they are written down now.
research.PROUDSOUL.title: Fire of Proud
research.BAMBOOLIGHT.title: Bamboo Light
research.BLADEWHITE.title: White Sheath
research.BLADEWHITE.text.stage.1:
I think I need to forge a katana by myself.
First,I should find iron and gold as I need.
Recipes are written down.I will look up them.
research.BLADEWHITE.text.stage.2:
I did it!A steel katana made by myself
then,I put it in the sheath.
There are some new recipes,and they are written down now.
research.SLASHBLADE.title: SlashBlade
research.SLASHBLADE.text.stage.1:
There are some problems in my research.
I should rethink,and I need learn more knowledge from ancient works.
research.SLASHBLADE.text.stage.2:
There is SlashBlade's recipe.
Why don't have a try?
I need more material,then I will make it well.
research.SLASHBLADE.text.stage.3:
Finally I did it.
This is SlashBlade.A katana,a beautiful katana.
There are some new recipes,and they are written down now.
research.BEAUTY.title: The beauty of Katana.
research.BEAUTY.text.stage.1:
Oh,They are too ugly to stand.
Can they change the way they look?I don't know.
Let me read this book now.
research.BEAUTY.text.stage.2:
Oh,There's a good way called Infusion.
Recipes are there.Now let me have a try.I can't stand their ugly style!
research.THAUMIUMKATANA.title: When Thaumaturgy meet Katana.
research.THAUMIUMKATANA.text.stage.1:
Thaumium,an interesting metal for me.
I want to know whether it can be a good material for katana,so I know what I should do.
research.THAUMIUMKATANA.text.stage.2:
OK,I think I need to study Thaumaturgy now.
I think I find a new world,between Thaumaturgy and Forging.
research.THAUMIUMKATANA.text.stage.3:
I think......Is it a katana?Just like a toy,I think.
But It has some......power?I can't tell.
There are some new recipes,and they are written down now.
